title: "Clock Wallpapers"
content: Clock Wallpapers is your go-to website for finding the perfect wallpaper for your digital clock or timer. Our collection features a simple graphic of a digital clock or timer, with ample space for setting alarms and countdowns. With a variety of designs to choose from, you can easily customize your device's home screen to match your style and personality. Whether you're looking for a sleek and modern design or something more playful and whimsical, Clock Wallpapers has got you covered. Browse our collection today and elevate your device's home screen to the next level!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a simple graphic of a digital clock or timer, with space for setting alarms and countdowns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
